Name: Update Your Profile
subject: Update Your Profile
contentData:
Hello {firstName} {lastName},

We are delighted to welcome you to {company}.

As an essential step towards getting started, we kindly request you to update your profile information to ensure that we have accurate and up-to-date details about you.

To update your profile, please follow these steps:

  1. Click on the following link: {url}
  2. Review and update your information as needed.
  3. Click 'Save' to confirm your changes.

Your participation in keeping your profile information current is crucial for effective communication and collaboration within the organization. Please take a moment to ensure that your information is complete and accurate.

If you encounter any difficulties or have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

Thank you for joining us, and we look forward to your active participation!

Best regards,

{company}.

Name: Forgot Password
subject: Forgot Password
contentData:
Dear {firstName} {lastName},

We received a request to reset your password for your EffortlessHRM account. To proceed with the password reset, please click the link below:

{url}

If you did not initiate this request or believe it to be in error, please ignore this email.

Thank you for using EffortlessHRM!

Best Regards, Team EffortlessHRM

Name: Delete Task
subject: Task Deletion Notification
contentData:
Hello {firstName} {lastName},

We wanted to inform you that a task has been deleted in the Effortless HRM management system.

Task Name: {taskName}

Project: {projectName}

Date of Deletion: {date}

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact support.

Thank you,

{company}

Name: Task Unassigned
subject: Task Unassigned Notification
contentData:
Dear {firstName} {lastName},

We hope this message finds you well. We wanted to inform you that the following task has been unassigned from you in the Effortless HRM management system:

Task Name: {taskName}

Project: {projectName}

Date of Unassignment: {date}

If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to us.

Best regards,

{company}

Name: Task Assigned
subject: Task Assigned Notification
contentData:
Dear {firstName} {lastName},

I hope this email finds you well. We have assigned a new task to you.

Your expertise and skills make you the ideal candidate for this task.

Task Details:

  • Task Title: {taskName}
  • Due Date: {endDate}
  • Priority: {priority}
  • Description: {description}

Thanks,

{company}

Name: Approval Request Leave Application
subject: Approval Request Leave Application
contentData:
Dear {firstName} {lastName},

{employeeName} has submitted a leave application and requires your approval.

Leave Application Details:

Employee Name: {employeeName}

Type of Leave: {leaveType}

Leave Period: {startDate} to {endDate}

Total Days: {totalDays}

Reason: {reason}

Please log into the {company} portal to approve or decline.

If no action is taken, the request remains pending.

Best regards,

{company}

Name: Termination of Employment
subject: Termination of Employment
contentData:
Hello {firstName} {lastName},

We confirm your employment with {company} has been terminated, effective {terminationDate}.

Reason: {terminationReason}

Notice Given: {noticeGiven}

Performance Warnings Issued: {PerformanceWarningIssued}

Return company property and attend the exit interview scheduled for {exitInterview}.

Best regards,

{company}

Name: Birthday email template to employee
subject: Happy Birthday, {firstName}
contentData:
Dear {firstName} {lastName},

Happy Birthday from all of us at {company}! Wishing you a joyous day!

Best regards,

{company}

Name: Birthday email template to manager
subject: It's {employeeFirstName} {employeeLastName}'s Birthday Today! ðŸŽ‚
contentData:
Dear {firstName} {lastName},

Today is {employeeFirstName} {employeeLastName}'s birthday! ðŸŽ‚

Name: Work anniversary email template to employee
subject: Celebrating Your {years} Year Work Anniversary with {company}!
contentData:
Dear {firstName} {lastName},

Congratulations on your {years} year anniversary with {company}!

Thank you!

Best regards,

{company}

Name: Work anniversary email template to manager
subject: Celebrating {employeeFirstName} {employeeLastName}'s {years} Year Work Anniversary!
contentData:
Dear {firstName} {lastName},

Today marks {employeeFirstName} {employeeLastName}'s {years} year anniversary! Please recognize their dedication.

Best regards,

{company}

Name: Appraisal notification email template to employee
subject: Your Performance Appraisal Results Are Ready!
contentData:
Dear {firstName} {lastName},

Your performance appraisal has been completed. Please check the portal for details.

Best regards,

{company}

Name: Appraisal notification email template to manager
subject: {employeeFirstName} {employeeLastName}'s Appraisal Results Shared
contentData:
Dear {firstName} {lastName},

The appraisal results for {employeeFirstName} {employeeLastName} have been shared. Please follow up if needed.

Best regards,

{company}

Name: Your Leave Application Has Been Approved
subject: Your Leave Application Has Been Approved
contentData:

Best regards,

Name: Expense Report Submission Request

Best regards,

{company}

contentData:

Best regards,

{company}
